a	O	O

dystrophy	O	O
is	O	O
a	O	O
fatal	O	O

in	O	O
which	O	O
the	O	O

by	O	O
fat	O	O
.	O	O

in	O	O
early	O	O

.	O	O

the	O	O
disease	O	O

a	O	O
non-working	O	O

of	O	O

Institute	I-ORG	B-ORG
